misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
description: The `KeyGenerator` class uses the provided cryptographic algorithm name to generate a key. In this case, the `crypto` variable is set to "RC2", which is a weak and insecure algorithm. Using weak or broken cryptographic algorithms can easily be exploited by attackers.
recommendation: Use a secure and randomized cryptographic algorithm instead. Consider using a well-established and widely adopted algorithm such as AES.
